itunes:title: From the Archives: Talking with the Bestseller Whisperer
title: From the Archives: Talking with the Bestseller Whisperer
description: Author and host, Bianca Marais, chats with Tara Singh Carlson, the first editor to have two of their novels picked by Reese Witherspoon's Hello Sunshine Book Club. Besides acquiring numerous bestsellers like The Silent Wife, The House at Tyneford and The Light We Lost, she's also edited the publishing phenomenon, Where The Crawdad's Sing by Delia Owens, which has been on the New York Times Best Seller list for more than three years. Tara discusses what it takes to be the next Delia Owens as she shares amazing insight into how bestsellers happen.

Tara discusses what it takes to be the next Delia Owens as she shares amazing insight into how bestsellers happen.
itunes:author: Bianca Marais and editor, Tara Singh Carlson
itunes:keywords: publishing, writing, Tara Singh Carlson, Bianca Marais, Where the Crawdads Sing, Delia Owens, bestsellers, writing advice, editing
